member.name: ID2D1Factory1.GetRegisteredEffects
member.summary: Returns the class IDs of the currently registered effects and global effects on this factory.
member.param: When this method returns, contains an array of effects. NULL if no effects are retrieved.
The capacity of the effects array.
When this method returns, contains the number of effects copied into effects.
When this method returns, contains the number of effects currently registered in the system.

member.name: ID2D1Factory1.RegisterEffectFromStream
member.summary: Registers an effect within the factory instance with the property XML specified as a stream.
member.param: The identifier of the effect to be registered.
A list of the effect properties, types, and metadata.

param.name: bindings
param.para: An array of properties and methods.
This binds a property by name to a particular method implemented by the effect author to handle the property. The name must be found in the corresponding propertyXml.

member.param: The number of bindings in the binding array.
The static factory that is used to create the corresponding effect.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1Factory1.UnregisterEffect
member.summary: Unregisters an effect within the factory instance that corresponds to the classId provided.
member.param: The identifier of the effect to be unregistered.
member.returns: D2DERR_EFFECT_IS_NOT_REGISTERED if the effect is not registered, S_OK otherwise.
